mapper.select: select to_char(schedule_date,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') as performanceRound from schedule where (schedule_date between to_date('${selectedDate} 00:00:00','yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${selectedDate} 23:59:59','yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss')) and performance_no = #{performanceNo} AND sysdate+9/24 >= start_ticket_date order by schedule_date
select distinct to_char(schedule_date,'yyyy/mm/dd') as schedule_date from schedule where performance_no = #{performanceNo} AND sysdate >= start_ticket_date order by schedule_date
select performance_title, performance_no from performance where performance_title like '%'||#{performanceTitle}||'%'

select p.performance_no,p.performance_title,p.start_date,p.end_date,i.renamed_file_name,c.performance_code_name from performance p join performanceimage i on p.performance_no = i.performance_no join CLASSIFICATION c on p.performance_code = c.performance_code where c.performance_code_name = #{category} and image_category='P' and p.end_date>sysdate order by end_date asc

select rownum rnum, A.* from (select t.performance_no, p.performance_title, i.renamed_file_name, count(*) as "CNT" from ticket t join performance p on t.performance_no = p.performance_no join performanceimage i on p.performance_no = i.performance_no where p.performance_code = 'MU' and i.image_category = 'P' and p.end_date>sysdate group by t.performance_no, p.performance_title,i.renamed_file_name order by CNT desc) A

select rownum rnum, A.* from (select t.performance_no, p.performance_title, i.renamed_file_name, count(*) as "CNT" from ticket t join performance p on t.performance_no = p.performance_no join performanceimage i on p.performance_no = i.performance_no where p.performance_code = 'CO' and i.image_category = 'P' and p.end_date>sysdate group by t.performance_no, p.performance_title,i.renamed_file_name order by CNT desc) A

select rownum rnum, A.* from (select t.performance_no, p.performance_title, i.renamed_file_name, count(*) as "CNT" from ticket t join performance p on t.performance_no = p.performance_no join performanceimage i on p.performance_no = i.performance_no where p.performance_code = 'TH' and i.image_category = 'P' and p.end_date>sysdate group by t.performance_no, p.performance_title,i.renamed_file_name order by CNT desc) A

select p.performance_no,p.performance_title,p.start_date,p.end_date,i.renamed_file_name,pl.place_name from performance p join performanceimage i on p.performance_no = i.performance_no join place pl on p.place_code = pl.place_code where p.performance_code='MU' and image_category='P' and p.end_date>sysdate order by p.performance_title asc
select count(*) as "cnt" from performance where performance_code='MU'and end_date>sysdate

select p.performance_no,p.performance_title,p.start_date,p.end_date,i.renamed_file_name,pl.place_name from performance p join performanceimage i on p.performance_no = i.performance_no join place pl on p.place_code = pl.place_code where p.performance_code='CO' and image_category='P' and p.end_date>sysdate order by p.performance_title asc
select count(*) as "cnt" from performance where performance_code='CO'and end_date>sysdate

select p.performance_no,p.performance_title,p.start_date,p.end_date,i.renamed_file_name,pl.place_name from performance p join performanceimage i on p.performance_no = i.performance_no join place pl on p.place_code = pl.place_code where p.performance_code='TH' and image_category='P' and p.end_date>sysdate order by p.performance_title asc
select count(*) as "cnt" from performance where performance_code='TH'and end_date>sysdate

select * from performance p left join performanceimage i using(performance_no) left join place pl using(place_code) where i.image_category='P' and p.performance_title like '%'||#{performanceTitle}||'%' and p.end_date>sysdate order by performance_title
select count(*) as "cnt" from performance where performance_title like '%'||#{performanceTitle}||'%' and performance_code='MU'and end_date>sysdate
select count(*) as "cnt" from performance where performance_title like '%'||#{performanceTitle}||'%' and performance_code='CO'and end_date>sysdate
select count(*) as "cnt" from performance where performance_title like '%'||#{performanceTitle}||'%' and performance_code='TH'and end_date>sysdate

select * from performance p left join performanceimage i using(performance_no) left join place pl using(place_code) where i.image_category='P' and p.performance_title like '%'||#{performanceTitle}||'%' and sysdate>=p.end_date order by p.end_date desc
select count(*) as "cnt" from performance where performance_title like '%'||#{performanceTitle}||'%' and sysdate>=end_date
select * from performanceimage i left join performance p using(performance_no) where i.image_category='M' and p.end_date>sysdate
select count(*) from performanceimage i left join performance p using(performance_no) where i.image_category='M' and p.end_date>sysdate
